#1.author: Gol D. Roger
#1.quote: I Left Everything I Gathered Together In One Place.

#2.author: Red-Haired Shanks
#2.quote: Nobody Hurts A Friend Of Mine!

#3.author: Marshall D. Teach
#3.quote: The Dreams Of Pirates Will Never End!

#4.author: Roronoa Zoro
#4.quote: Only I Can Call My Dream Stupid!

#5.author: Roronoa Zoro
#5.quote: Scars On The Back Are A Swordsman's Shame.

#6.author: Dr. Hiriluk
#6.quote: A Man Dies When People Forget Him!

#7.author: Rasa
#7.quote: The King's Promise Kept Ringing In My Head.

#8.author: Monkey D. Luffy
#8.quote: If You Don’t Take Risks, You Can’t Create A Future!

#9.author: Tony Tony Chopper
#9.quote: I’m Not A Monster! I’m A Doctor!

#10.author: Nico Robin
#10.quote: Fools Who Don’t Respect The Past Are Doomed To Repeat It.

#11.author: Portgas D. Ace
#11.quote: We Have To Live A Life Of No Regrets.

#12.author: Sanji
#12.quote: Don’t Start A Fight You Can’t Finish.

#13.author: Franky
#13.quote: A Man Is Someone Who Forgives A Woman’s Lies!

#15.author: Donquixote Doflamingo
#15.quote: Justice Will Prevail, You Say? But Of Course It Will! Whoever Wins This War Becomes Justice!

#16.author: Nami
#16.quote: Life Is Like A Pencil That Will Surely Run Out, But Will Leave The Beautiful Writing Of Life.

#17.author: Monkey D. Garp
#17.quote: Heroes Are Those Who Endure To The End.

#18.author: Monkey D. Luffy
#18.quote: Power Isn't Determined By Your Size, But The Size Of Your Heart And Dreams!

#19.author: Roronoa Zoro
#19.quote: When The World Shoves You Around, You Just Gotta Stand Up And Shove Back!

#20.author: Boa Hancock
#20.quote: No Matter How Many Enemies I Have To Face, I Will Not Let You Lay A Finger On Luffy!

#21.author: Jinbe
#21.quote: A Person Becomes Strong When They Have Someone They Want To Protect.

#22.author: Shanks
#22.quote: By Experiencing Both Victory And Defeat, Running Away And Shedding Tears, A Man Becomes A Man.

#23.author: Nico Robin
#23.quote: Sometimes The Only Thing You Have Left Is To Believe In Your Friends.

#24.author: Dracule Mihawk
#24.quote: It Is Not A Sin To Dream. But To Dream And Forget One’s Purpose… That Is A Sin.

#25.author: Sanji
#25.quote: For A Cook, The Knife Is A Partner, Not A Weapon.

#26.author: Blackbeard
#26.quote: No One is Born Into This World to Be Alone.

#27.author: Usopp
#27.quote: Being Alone Is More Painful Than Getting Hurt.

#28.author: Gol D. Roger
#28.quote: Inherited Will, The Swelling Of The Changing Times, And The Dreams Of People. These Are Things That Cannot Be Stopped.

#29.author: Bartholomew Kuma
#29.quote: If You Were To Go On A Trip, Where Would You Like To Go?

#30.author: Brook
#30.quote: Yohohoho! Even In Death, I Keep Laughing. That’s How I’ve Always Lived.
